name: Multiplayer PE for Terraria
description:
****** Global Multiplayer for Terraria Mobile & Your own Personal All Items Server *******

Your own Personal All Items Server:

- A server full off every possible Item in the game, just for you!
- Fill your inventory with anything you want.
- No need to dig/search its all ready for you to collect in the perfectly organised map (see screenshots).

Global Multiplayer with Voice Chat:

- Host your own Game for others to Join.
- Join other Players Hosted games.
- Voice Chat so players can communicate whilst playing (or you can disable voice chat if you wish)

No subscriptions, no recurring charges. Open up your Terraria world and Gameplay.

From the makers of Multiplayer for Minecraft PE, this fully featured App with perfectly designed interface allows you to:

- Create/Host your own servers and advertise them on the App for others to join you.
- Create/Host private servers, so only friends you've invited can join.
- Free in game voice chat. You won't need to learn sign language in Terraria, all participants can use in game voice chat to communicate.
- Server hosts can manage users, with the ability to kick and ban griefers.
- Add friends through Facebook or the Apps own friends system
- Invite friends to join your server
- Rating system so you can rate other users
- Chat system, so you can host a chat room for friends only or anyone using the App
- History of servers you visited so you can easily return to a server
- Personalise your profile with a picture of your choice
- Play online using WiFi
- Host online using 3G/4G/LTE


[NOTE: This application will require you to install a VPN profile and connect to our network via the VPN. Only game related traffic will pass over the VPN, all other traffic will pass over your normal network connection. This application requires you to have Terraria. Game centre login required to Join/Host servers or Chats.]

(If you have any issues, please contact us using the form on our website! We've yet to find anyone who's issue we've not been able to fix!)

Disclaimer – This is a third party App, it is not the game Terraria or affiliated with the game and its makers in anyway.
